Title: Clarion call of victory, have a bright future
Publisher: Zhongguo dianying gongsi (中国电影公司)
Notes: This poster was published to accompany a music production from the People's Liberation Army 1 August Film Studio, hailing Hua Guofeng. It featured an orchestra and choir, as well as solo performers. Although undated, its permiere was probably in 1976-1977.
